channel.title: Adobe on Nick
channel.description: Recent content in Adobe on Nick

item.title: This PC loves Adobe
item.description: So much, that it installed multiple copies of the same Flash updates: Actually, it appears to be a registry glitch rather than multiple copies. As much as I don't like Adobe's updating/installation practices (opted-in toolbars, programs), they do have a relatively easy to find and use Flash removal application.
